name: She Might Think
description:
'She Might Think' is a little game in which you'll meet different girls and see what they have to say.

They'll be visiting the same apartment, each with their own opinion on a selection of objects.

The goal is secretly to show you that every girl is unique, has her own opinions and definitely doesn't answer to gender stereotypes.

We used the opinions of real women and friends to create our characters (and I thank them again for helping us <3).

As it's the first time we're doing a project like that we're very curious to have your opinion on it! (even if you don't like it!) And if you liked it don't hesitate to share!

Game Design by Marion Esquian - @Mayhow

Art by Ludivine Berthouloux - @LuluBTX

Music by Podington Bear - FreeMusicArchive.Org
